GameConditionDef.label: Grid Check
GameConditionDef.description: Abnormal activity detected in the station's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The abnormality in the station's powernet has been resolved, power will return shortly.

GameConditionDef.label: Code Green - All Clear
GameConditionDef.description: Standard operating level. No immediate or clear threat to the station. All departments may carry out work as normal.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The Alert level has been updated.

GameConditionDef.label: Code Blue - Confirmed Threat
GameConditionDef.description: Elevated alert level. There are reports or other proof available to indicate that there is a threat to the station.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The Alert level has been updated.

GameConditionDef.label: Code Red - Immediate Threat
GameConditionDef.description: Maximum alert level. There is an immediate threat to the station or severe damage. Martial Law is in effect.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The Alert level has been updated.

GameConditionDef.label: Code Delta - Imminent Destruction
GameConditionDef.description: The station's self destruct mechanism has been engaged due to overwhelming threat to the station. Martial Law is in effect.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The Alert level has been updated.
